name: Dr. Sarah Johnson
bio: Dr. Johnson has over 15 years of experience in small animal medicine. She specializes in preventive care, internal medicine, and geriatric care for cats and dogs. She is passionate about building long-term relationships with pets and their families.
education: Board Certified in Small Animal Internal Medicine

name: Dr. Michael Chen
bio: Dr. Chen is a board-certified veterinary surgeon with expertise in orthopedic and soft tissue surgeries. He has performed over 2000 surgical procedures and is known for his meticulous approach and compassionate care.

name: Dr. Emily Rodriguez
bio: Dr. Rodriguez specializes in the care of exotic pets including birds, reptiles, and small mammals. She has extensive experience with unique species and is dedicated to providing specialized care for these special companions.

name: Dr. James Wilson
bio: Dr. Wilson leads our emergency department with over 12 years of critical care experience. He is trained in advanced life support techniques and is available for emergency cases 24/7.
education: Board Certified in Emergency and Critical Care
